title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4033.5 - Time for declaration of overweight
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4033.5 - Time for declaration of overweight

State Regulations

If a jockey intends to carry overweight exceeding by
more than two pounds the weight that his or her horse is to carry, the owner or
trainer consenting, such jockey must declare the amount of overweight to the
clerk of the scales at least 45 minutes before the time appointed for the race, and the clerk shall cause the overweight to be stated on the notice commission
immediately. For failure on the part of a jockey to comply with this section, such jockey may be punished as provided by sections 4022.12 through
4022.15
of this

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
